name: Ronova
desc: The Ruler of Death, one of the Primordial One's Shades.

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.name: Shades
customize.desc: Four Shades created by the Primordial One.

customize.text: Ronova is one of the four Shades.

customize.name: Yohualtecuhtin, Lord of the Night
customize.desc: An angel who created the Night Kingdom in Natlan.

customize.text: Under Ronova's guidance, the Lord of the Night created the Night Kingdom in Natlan.

customize.name: Xbalanque
customize.desc: The first Pyro Archon, who defeated the Flamelord and revived from the flames.

customize.text: Ronova gave powers to the first Pyro Archon. With it, the rules of Natlan were established: the Ode of Resurrection and the Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame.

customize.name: Mavuika
customize.desc: The leader of Natlan who inherited the Ancient Name of "Kiongozi." She made a vow to illuminate the future of the nation of war with the Sacred Flame.

customize.text: The last Pyro Archon used the power of the divine throne and Ronova's power to fight with the Abyss. The price for the Ruler of Death's power is death.

customize.name: Il Capitano
customize.desc: The First of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers and the Sentinel Knight of Khaenri'ah. His real name is Thrain.

customize.text: The Ruler of Death cast a curse of immortality on the Khaenri'ahns, including the Sentient Knight. The Captain sacrificed himself instead of Mavuika for using Ronova's powers. He wanted to use the shade's rules against her. To sustain the curse of immortality, the Ruler of Death relinquishes her demand for the price of "death."

imgDesc.text: The Ruler of Death and The Captain.
